pages.page: TomTom Bandit NOW EVERY HERO CAN SHARE HIS SKILLS FEATURES: • Shake your phone for a ready-to-share edit of your highlights. • Use the remote or camera to mark your own highlights as you record them. • In-camera sensors mark big moments, so you can nd them again easily. • Waterproof up to 165 ft without an additional case. • Ditch the cables, charge and transfer with the innovative batt-stick • Separate start and stop buttons. • Rotate the camera within the mount to always get a horizontal shot.
